idea-plugin.name: Markmap Preview
idea-plugin.description:
Adds interactive mind map preview for Markdown files using Markmap.

Features:

  • 🧠 Interactive mind map visualization of Markdown documents
  • 🎨 Follows your IDE's theme (light/dark mode) with automatic updates
  • ⚡ Real-time preview updates as you type
  • 🔍 Zoom and pan support
  • 📱 Three-view modes: Editor, Split, Preview with toolbar buttons

Usage:

Open any Markdown file and use the toolbar buttons to switch between Editor, Split, and Preview modes. Your markdown structure will be rendered as an interactive mind map!
